column5: Heres the deal.   If you go to the Spring Fishing Show please drop by the Fishing World Booth and if you buy something tell them your an OFC'er.  They have also offered up thier hats to ofners for only $2.99 each. (these are on sale to normal show goers for $9.99 but are normally $19.99 at the store.)   Cool hats .. cool store!
